title: I can't play a game with Yasou
body:
You see whenever I join a game as Yasou my LoL crashes
The only way to close the LoL client is to restart my pc
I have already gotten lower priority que because of this bug
It has happened again recently and I'm affaid I will be a time ban for a unknown bug
Please help me someone or maybe even a hotfix?
Ign - Jamie19

replies.body:
1. it's Yasuo
2. try using task manager?( and end task)


good luck trying to fix the problem?
You might be missing the files for a yasuo ability. Is it just when you play yasuo? Or does it crash if anyone is playing him? Because my friend had the same problem with shen.

Me too. Found a temp. solution though, close League from your Task Manager, and then reconnect. Works within a minute, before the minions spawn.

Also, for all those that try this, could you tell me if you get graphical glitches in game as well? (like, certain particles being invisible of different colour)
I'm having the exact problem :/ And only with Yasuo as well
